myName.title: I make & bring unique ideas.
myName.subtitle:
I'm a software engineer skilled in problem-solving and occasionally designing exceptional digital experiences.
I'm happy in frontend / backend (full stack) software development from 2020.
I'm also interested in creating and deployment Smart Contracts on the Blockchain and now I am still learning about Blockchain technology.

aboutMe.title: About Me
description: Hallo, My name is Febri, I'm born in Sidoarjo, November 1, 1995, Muslim, single, I am the first child of two siblings, My residence address is in Kalitengah, Tanggulangin, Sidoarjo, East Java. My last education is Bachelor of Informatics Engineering. I have experience as a Web programmer / Fullstack programmer from 2020.

My interest in computer science started back in 2012 when I was studying apps for learning since high school â€” it turns out programming skills are essential to achieve that, my journey with programming started from that time
Until now, I often work on projects from clients who still trust me to create/develop applications.
Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

description.text: Creating and development Web applications from clients with various frameworks such as Laravel, Next, Express, React js
I also master and have made Mobile Applications using React Native
WEB3 development is done as a team using the Framework NEXT, React typescript
Here I learned how to make a Smart Contract Using Hardhat, the Solidity programming language
Back up all IT-related work, such as IT support, computer installation and computer networks
Works with multiple languages, platforms, frameworks and content management systems like PHP, JavaScript, Laravel, Next.js/React, VPS
Build and develop projects from each management and implement them into applications
I've also created a Gateway system implemented on a CRM connected Turnstile machine, created for incoming and outgoing members, using a Raspberry Pi

work.title: Some of the Apps I've Built

fitnessworks.name: Fitnessworks
fitnessworks.description: The Fitnessworks company profile website is quite new, I designed and built it together with my colleagues in the UI/UX design department. I built this website using the NextJs framework so that in the future this website can interact with users.

perikanan.name: Perikanan
perikanan.description: On this website, requests from my clients are made to support the marketing of sales of processed fish products. This website is also dynamic, admin can edit the products they want to display.

simpleSosmed.name: Simple Social Media
simpleSosmed.description: I built this Simple Social Media using React Js as the Frontend and Express Js as the Backend. I built this website solely because it was inspired by Facebook, indeed this website is still far from perfect and I still want to develop it

urban.name: Urban Athletes
urban.description: This Urban Athletes company profile website is the parent company of Fitnessworks, previously this website was built using Wordpress and then I rebuilt it using the Laravel framework. This website is already connected to the company's internal application by consuming the Rest API to display class times and schedules.

firstMobileApp.name: My first mobile App
firstMobileApp.description: This Mobile App is the first application I made using React Native, this application consumes a dummy API to display products.

example.name: Aplikasi Name example
example.description: Lorem I had the opportunity to lead the development of a token project, which aimed to create a decentralized ecosystem for peer-to-peer transactions. Overseeing the planning and development of the project, including the design and implementation of the smart contract and blockchain technology. Here i share with you YPredict - v1 for the private sale.

contact.title: What's Next?
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Although I'm currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
